subject: Mental Health
title: Anxiety in Adulthood
description: A quick win: understand Anxiety in Adulthood.

hook.text: Bills, deadlines, and relationships pile up. Adult anxiety often hides in busyness.

buildup.text: Adults are less likely to seek help, normalizing chronic stress as part of life.

discovery.text: Untreated anxiety in adulthood raises the risk of heart disease and diabetes.

twist.text: Many adults discover they have an anxiety disorder only after a physical crisis.

climax.text: The average delay between onset and treatment is over a decade.

punchline.text: Calling it stress doesn't make it less clinical.

quiz.question: What is the average delay between anxiety onset and treatment?
